title: Toosii - shop (Official Video) ft. DaBaby
author: Toosii2xVEVO
description:

Stream/Download Toosii new mixtape "Thank You For Believing" here:

Toosii Feat. DaBaby ""shop"" Lyrics:

(Fasho)
(Fasho)

[Hook]
Tell a nigga don’t play
Make it hard for you, send shots right where you lay
Know I keep my distance, one call I’m on the way
I’m tryna see bout it
And the only man I fear is God cuz they know we bout it Yeah they know we bout it
Only run wit steppas can’t do a weak body
Only V8’s and V12’s when we riding
Bad bitch she riding
And I gotta fuck wit the gang gang
Know he sliding
RIP the opps
Gotta put clip on opps
Fucking wit rich niggas
Won’t hit licks, hit for stocks
All off the whips convertible, tell her to pick the drop And I’ll take a nigga life before I take a bitch to shop

[Verse 1 - Toosii]
Only do the red key
Ain’t a dead body but I stretch her out on the bed sheet 
Before I fuck you know that I ask her for the head please
Get the nigga dead please
10K get the whip flipped
That’s a rip stick
Dead G’s, dead glocks
Not Young Money but I’m down to make the ‘Bedrock’ I’ma roll out the pussy
Watch the gang roll a dead opp
Told the bitch to head rock
Know the beat knock how her head bop
And I’ma clean nigga but you know I like the head slop
Slide when we headshot
I’ma fan of the green beam don’t do the red dots
I’m the type of nigga give her dick I’ma make her legs lock And I’ll still run a nigga down I’m tryna head shop
I’m hittin’ every shot

Make it hard for you, send shots right where you lay

Know he sliding
RIP the opps
Gotta put clip on opps
Fucking wit rich niggas
Won’t hit licks, hit for stocks
All off the whips convertible, tell her to pick the drop And I’ll take a nigga life before I take a bitch to shop

[Verse 2 - DaBaby]
You ever stepped in my Amiri’s, these ain’t Levi’s
Knew how it felt to hold a gun when I was knee high
Uncle Ray let me hold his 38 whenever we’d ride
At the age of 5 back then I ain’t understand
I ain’t see why (LET’S GO)
And a nigga damn sure never saw me rappin’
Either way it go they gon’ have to catch me wit that fire, no lackin’
Quit frontin’ yo move, ain’t none of y’all bitch ass niggas bout no action I get mad in this bitch come off my hip and wet up yo starter jacket Any niggas I’m wit gon step on any other nigga that saw it happen Hope you lil’ niggas know
Every nigga round me he done did it before
I kill you at my show
Two hundred twenty-five thousand get me out the door
Half a million or more
I make her cry me a river before we get close
Need to get me a boat

[Hook]
Tell a nigga don’t play
Make it hard for you, send shots right where you lay
Know I keep my distance, one call I’m on the way
I’m tryna see bout it
And the only man I fear is God cuz they know we bout it Yeah they know we bout it
Only run wit steppas can’t do a weak body
Only V8’s and V12’s when we riding
Bad bitch she riding

Only do the red key

そして俺はニガをクリーンにするが、俺はヘッドスロップが好きなんだぜ
俺たちがヘッドショットした時のスライド
俺は緑のビームのファンだ 赤のドットはやめとけ

親しくなる前に彼女を泣かせてやる
